original_text: But Abraham was sure that, if Isaac died, God could raise Isaac to life again. We could even say that is a picture of what really happened. It was like Abraham did receive Isaac back from death.
korean_text: 그가 하나님이 능히 이삭을 죽은 자 가운데서 다시 살리실 줄로 생각한지라 비유컨대 그를 죽은 자 가운데서 도로 받은 것이니라

sentences.original_text: God could raise Isaac to life again
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 이삭을 다시 살리실 수 있다는 것을

sentences.original_text: that is a picture of what really happened
It was like Abraham did receive Isaac
